website_summaries.verdict: This eye-catching mini crossbody bag can hold small items and is perfect for short trips out.
pros: Small, cute, cross-body bag can hold an assortment of smaller items like 6-inch smartphones, credit cards, glasses, cash, keys, travel charger, lipstick, and tissues
Made of cotton and available in several unique, colorful designs
Priced right and makes a great gift

customer_reviews.title: Nice little purse!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy; well worth the money! Embroidery is lovely, clean and tight, as are the seams. (Embroidered on front and back.) Pretty hardware, ample space for my use: to take my phone, cards, cash, comb, mirror, and lipstick with me when I don't want to take a full-sized purse. (My phone is a Galaxy S7 Edge, but there's room for a much larger phone.) There's room if I want to fit in other items. The adjustable strap is long enough to carry as a crossbody; also comes with a separate wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Reede Anne Wright

customer_reviews.title: The embroidery is beautiful. The bag holds exactly what I need it ...
customer_reviews.text: The embroidery is beautiful. The bag holds exactly what I need it to. However, there are two issues I have with it. 1) The strap is not long enough to be cross body. I made it as long as it would go and bridged it with the wrist strap. I ended up adding a long loop of ribbon to it so it would be long enough. 2) The cheap plastic hooks have both broken. I will make up some type of solution. For the record, I find cheap parts annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I bought it for a trip to carry my phone and travel charger and it's perfect. Definitely recommend if you are thinking about it! Took it with me and it was perfect! Fit my bulky travel charger and my phone and chord as well as money n cards. Buy it! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the photos
customer_reviews.text: Very adorable bag! Its bigger than I thought it would be. True to photos! I really adore this! Straps are cheap but honestly this is a great bag for the price. Came packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Jean

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, easy to carry for short trips with small, important things.
customer_reviews.text: So cute, easy to carry over the shoulder or cross body. You can tuck a small card wallet inside with your cell phone and a few other essentials and it's perfect for a trip to the mall or zoo where a big purse is too bulky. Great little purse, love it. The front pocket is great for poking a little cash.
customer_reviews.author: B. Neal

customer_reviews.title: This mini purse is beyond adorable, the colors are so pretty and vibrant and ...
customer_reviews.text: This mini purse is beyond adorable, the colors are so pretty and vibrant and the size is perfect. The only thing I am not a fan of is the stitching. In the front pocket, I could see a small opening already, which sucks because it means this purse might not last. I tried to fix it up myself the best way I could so there is that. Other than that, this is a very beautiful purse and I am overall satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for big phone & essentials
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking everywhere for a purse like this. Holds my iPhone 6s (in an otterbox case) , my cards & money, lipstick and whatnot... with a cross body strap. Zippered compartments, very secure. Tiny, pretty. Perfect. I also really appreciate the evidence that the seller continues to improve this product based on feedback. I couldn't be happier. Easy 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Thorburn

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!  You need this purse......
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the BEST purchase I have ever made on Amazon!!! For the price, I did not expect much.....but I was happily mistaken. First of all, it was incredibly well made & super crafted in stitching and all the little details on the zipper pulls and (2) handles/straps that it came with. It is absolutely beautiful!!!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS COMPANY AND THIS PURSE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: I love it! And My grandma even bought one too
customer_reviews.text: I use this purse literally every day! I love it all the pockets are the perfect size and I am in love! I will confess the strap can be a little uncomfy at times (mostly on the really hot days and you’re hot and the strap rubs on ya a bit) but it doesn’t diminish the fact that this purse is really great in general
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Soto

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pictures love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I made this purchase it’s perfect for my trip to Vegas . It holds my iPhone 11 max pro And a few other things. It isn’t bulky and very it’s very stylish . Both zippers glide open and closed easily and the front buckle works well also . It’s hard to tell if you will like a product from just seeing pictures but this looks just like the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: exactly like the photos!
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday. It has two zippers and a back pocket that you can use to hold phone/tissue/reciepts. The small crossbody looks exactly like the photos. If anything happens to my crossbody bag i will update my review, so consider that a good purchase and that the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: ...no name...

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute
customer_reviews.text: If you like color, this is for you. Really cute. Bigger than a wallet. Fits your phone, cash a few cards even a small hair brush or comb. great little cross body bag when you don't want to carry a big purse. I would buy again to give as a gift. Perfect size for a little girl also.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size, fits phone, keys and cards. Nice quality for the price, vibrant colors. Comes with a short and a long strap. I purchased the wallet-style one.
customer_reviews.author: TALaff

customer_reviews.title: Small, light weight, and lovely
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small purse to just carry my cellphone and keys. This works great. It had two compartments, an inner pocket, and an outer pocket. It's good for organization of small items. Also, the threadwork is gorgeous. It's exactly as described by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Hands free phone storage
customer_reviews.text: Since most women’s pants don’t have pockets, I needed something to hold my phone and keys when taking the dog for a walk. This is perfect for hands free phone storage. The embroidery is colorful and bright. It fits across my chest and it’s easy to access items from the purse. I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: The Learning Guru

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful work of Art!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little handbag. I use when I walk my hound. I am able to put in a house key, doggies bags, my cell and earbuds if I want to listen to music or something. It is very light-weight so it is not cumbersome to carry. I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Trendy, unique, lightweight, design, ability
customer_reviews.text: This is really good looking and is very unique. I love the colors and I love the ability to use it as a crossover, wristlet and/ or over the shoulder. Several compartments. Fits just the right sizes for everything. I love it and it is well made. The Findings on it are not cheap looking at all. Very affordable super cute, giftable for sure
customer_reviews.author: IT'S ME SB

customer_reviews.title: Oh I LOVE this little purse
customer_reviews.text: Oh I LOVE this little purse. So pretty - kind of old school design. I use it at work to carry my phone when I'm not wearing clothing with pockets. I work in a highly secured area where no cell phones are allowed "in sight," and this works great to carry it & my MP3 player & a few other do-dads. Comes with a Long strap and a short wrist strap & you can switch out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purse and so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: The embroidery is so pretty on this purse and it is absolutely perfect for holding just my keys, wallet and business card holder. There are times when I don't want my "usual" purse - it's just too big. This purse is PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Shanerrific

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized little bag. It holds my LG V30 with a case, my credit card holder, glasses, and cash, pretty much all I need for every day running around. Love the colors, it's so bright and pretty, and the fiance was impressed that it's really embroidered and not just an iron-on.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very Practical
customer_reviews.text: This cute bag is just what i needed. room enough for my card holder wallet, cell phone asthma inhaler(NOT shades you will need to keep them on your face) extra cash....great for any occasion that you don't need a large bag. Every woman's need is different but it is perfect for what i needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small bag to use when I’m running my errands locally and don’t want to lug my larger bag with me. This is a very pretty and well made bag that easily fits my wallet, phone and a few other essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Patty K

customer_reviews.title: I feel it will be excellent in keeping all important papers and phone especially when traveling.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, spacious, small cross body purse that be used for anything. I can fit my large phone in one of the 2 zippered compartments. There is also a pocket in front under snap closure. Nice enough to wear to concerts which I do often.
customer_reviews.author: barbara smith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice received many complements the only thing about this bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice received many complements the only thing about this bag I didn't like was the very thin strap I use it only occasionally because I'm afraid it might break

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I was confined to a wheelchair for 3 months and this little bag was perfect for carrying my license and necessities. Had tons of compliments. It easily held my phone and date book.
customer_reviews.author: Judy R...

customer_reviews.title: Cute travel bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little bag and the embroidery is great. I bought this for an upcoming trip and think it will be perfect. Came with a cross body strap and wristlet strap. Should be perfect to carry a small wallet and my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the embroidery on this bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the embroidery on this bag, but I found that the strap was a bit thin and hurt my neck when I wore. I would have liked the strap to be a bit thicker or more cushioned so that the strap doesn't "cut" into my neck when I wear the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste E. Koroglu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It fits my cell phone perfectly. And has plenty of space on the other side for quite a bit of stuff. I keep money, chapstick and a asthma inhaler in mine and still have room for more. And it's very pretty it's embroidered. Not just printed on. A nice little purse for the money
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty but doesn’t hold an iPhone 6s Plus with an otter box case, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I needed! Large enough to hold my phone and a few odds and ends, small enough to not be a "purse" over my shoulder! It is actually prettier in person than it looked on line and is very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shih Tzu mom

customer_reviews.title: Yes. As pictured as described
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Comes with long strap and a hand held one. Well made. Well worth the price. Very light nice dimensions and very sturdy. Don't think twice!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little purse.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve received so many compliments on this small purse. Perfect size for everyday use. Durable, too. The colors and artistry are stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Rsb2

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. I had ordered something similar from FB, and liked It. This is better quality, with the pattern on both sides, and cheaper, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little purse. It holds my cell, two small wallets and other necessities easily. My only improvements would be to put a stronger clasp on it and a thicker strap. I think the thin strap could easily be cut by a purse-snatcher. Otherwise, it's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and not sure how the recipient is using it, but when it arrived I was very pleased with the quality and was happy to give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Brendiecakes

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated, don't like the strap attachment (cheap), didn't fit properly, had a wrist attachment but no place to attach it to
customer_reviews.author: Taleana C.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute!!!! Sometimes my regular, larger bags are just way too much... and this purse is perfect. It’s holds the essentials: my phone, my smaller wallet, keys, and lipstick or balm. Great quality. It’s canvas and the embroidery is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Amagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. I get many compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. I get many compliments on it. It goes well with everything. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant & unique bag!
customer_reviews.text: Such an adorable little bag! Perfect for the essentials & lightweight! Very unique too! Love it! Plan on getting a few other styles & colors!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen g.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Well made beyond pics. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful quality embroidery! Plenty of room. I can put my phone 7 inch. My RFIDcase. My lipstick,and checkbook. I get compliments daily. Will be buying some for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: LjC

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, workmanship not so much
customer_reviews.text: Cute bag but my flap was sewed on off-centered which annoys me. I started to send but, but it is cheap so I just kept. Great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than what I thought!
customer_reviews.text: It's actually bigger than I thought, it's very cute and I plan on using it like a fanny pack. I love it! And it can fit a lot of stuff in it, especially my Samsung note 8.
customer_reviews.author: HotCakes123

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and function
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful and the perfect size for all my essentials. Everywhere I go, people always stop and tell me how much they love my purse!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐Absolutely love it!⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I've been looking for! I had tried for months to find a wallet, with a strap but with no luck. I've received compliments on my new bag, it's very cute pretty lightweight and Carries exactly what I need to take with me!
customer_reviews.author: trieka

customer_reviews.title: So gorgeous and well made, perfect size for Note 8 and a wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and put it inside the larger bag and it now holds my phone and wallet inside it so I can just pull it out and use this smaller one when I don't need a whole big bag. They are both gorgeous and well made. I recommend you buy both.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Rather

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but really small, not as pictured with model. No straps were included. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneOH

customer_reviews.title: Just like pic!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse! I wanted something small that would mainly hold my wallet and iPhone plus. This is perfect! So cute looks just like picture, zippers work great. Strap is long enough for cross body.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bruton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag and get lots of compliments on it but the strap connection broke and I had to sew it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Believing

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty. Perfect for I phone 6
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. Perfect for I phone 6, wallet and keys!!! I love it!!! Looks just like picture. I get a lot of compliments on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee H

customer_reviews.title: Its unique
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my little sister and she loves the colors and patterns on it. It's a nice lil hand bag!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Exactly as pictured and described. I bought this to wear as a cross body while I’m on the motorcycle. Fits my iPhone, a lip gloss, credit card, cash and id.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I managed to get all the necessary items into this bag without a problem! It is a nice, pretty, lightweight bag that is saving my aching shoulder from carrying heavy leather bags!
customer_reviews.author: Maribe

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and cool little bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for when you only need to carry the essentials. It's very colorful and I get a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Streamer

customer_reviews.title: I get so many compliments on this purse.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great bag. I have two colors and have given so many as gifts. People really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl says

customer_reviews.title: Love this one
customer_reviews.text: Like the material it slides well when retrieving only phone size needs adjusting
customer_reviews.author: dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Sassy
customer_reviews.text: These bags are beautiful!! Easily holds iPhone , along with other necessities in two separate compartments with a pocket in one and all kept safe with good zippered tops. They are very well made and the colors seem to go with any outfit. Very pretty, fun and sassy looking! The company has excellent customer service, above and beyond! I'm really happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Cute bag
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten so many compliments on this bag. The embroidery is beautiful. It has a compartment for my phone and 2 zippered compartments for wallet, keys, lipstick, etc. The strap is the perfect length. It is very comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Teri McKee

customer_reviews.title: I love this purse
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse! More than just being cute, it has proven to be the perfect size for someone that HATES carrying a purse. In fact, I sometime find myself looking for it when it's already around my shoulders! HAHA
customer_reviews.author: Ginna

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I took this bag on vacation with me. It was perfect!!!! fits keys, cell phone, passport, small wallet and still had room. Going to buy more for vacation gifts for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: It is so pretty, and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to hold just a few things, phone and small wallet. It is so pretty, and well made. My granddaughter thought it was so beautiful, so I ended up giving it to her. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pingy

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: The hooks should be on opposite sides..this falls forward alot
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I love this little purse. It is the perfect size for phone, wallet and keys. The strap is long enough to wear as a cross body bag.
customer_reviews.author: K E Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great purse!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought the purse was going to be bigger, but it was actually perfect in size. It was a gift for my friend and she absolutely loves it!! Perfect for carrying phone and credit cards and going out!
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect gift for Young Women.
customer_reviews.text: This travel purse is a perfect gift for a young woman.
customer_reviews.author: G. Aladro

customer_reviews.title: really like it
customer_reviews.text: very small and compact, but enough space for me to put in what I need. Will be easy to throw in a suitcase and use for dinner or nicer occasions when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: cbw, fl

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it is
customer_reviews.text: Love it, gets lots of compliments. Lightweight, embroidered on both sides..definitely recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Brenda P.

customer_reviews.title: just as described
customer_reviews.text: Love it! exactly as described... I do wish the shoulder strap was permanent and a bit wider but is is not a problem at all
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for small this is perfect. You can't put much in it. Very light.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this bag. It has two compartments plus a pocket. Embroidery is beautiful and the overall quality is so good! I’m planning to use it while traveling for my passports.
customer_reviews.author: Amaluna

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you're an adult.
customer_reviews.text: It's too loud and not soft. The strap is NOT cross body.
customer_reviews.author: annieb

customer_reviews.title: Light, crossbody summer purse
customer_reviews.text: Small, but with enough room for the essentials- a great concert/festival purse!
customer_reviews.author: ScubaHoneybee

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. I get lots of compliments. Great for those quick trips to the market when you don't want to lug a large purse around.
customer_reviews.author: Little Gee

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and the perfect size! A little unsure of the long strap as it doesn't seem strong enough for the bag. It also came with a wristlet strap.
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very small an very cute for outings where u dont need a large purse
customer_reviews.author: Mari Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and just right size to accommodate basics. The 2 inside zippers keep stuff from falling out. Just wish there was another small zippered pocket outside backside for coins.
customer_reviews.author: Blee

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Made well, strong, holds my cell phone AND a few other small items. Perfect for summer when you don't want to carry a heavy purse.
customer_reviews.author: Karmic Grace

customer_reviews.title: Looks very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it for a gift for my granddaughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Zisek

customer_reviews.title: Small, but not too small.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my needs. Very pretty. Good to carry the minimum necessities - cell, wallet, glasses, and a few small odds and ends. Not for someone who carries half her life in her bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trips
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to have embroidery on both side, didn’t They quickly sent the correct item. Perfect for trips. Will hold phine, keys, DL, cash and credit cards. Roomy but petite. Not sure how it will hold up to day to day use.
customer_reviews.author: Lesuerpea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this set but I had to return it due to a broken hook😫
customer_reviews.author: jessica b.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and design. Well made. Fits my phone perfectly as well as cash, cards and change.
customer_reviews.author: MzBzzb

customer_reviews.title: Cute and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought.this for my daughter to carry when she just needed a small bag. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: vBishop

customer_reviews.title: You’ll get compliments!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This little purse holds a lot and looks good doing it!i I especially like the very long strap because I’m in a hands free, cross body purse phase. I like the Bohemian style of it, too. It’s well made and definitely a bargain at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and the bag is well made! It is a small bag but for carrying just a few essentials it will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Krntdrff

customer_reviews.title: Love This Crossbody Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse it's small stylish and can fit the essentials if not wanting to wear a big purse. Love the fabric and bright colors. I get a lot of compliments on this bag. I also love that it is crossbody for extra protection.
customer_reviews.author: BUSY SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite bag. It goes with everything and is perfect in size. I have received many compliments and I just think this bag is the cutest.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tr

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and practical to go on short trips and walking my three dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse to take my three dogs walking. It has three compartments and will hold all of my essentials I need to go on short trips or walk the fur kids.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMom315

customer_reviews.title: Great little bag!!
customer_reviews.text: A great litttle bag it holds my cell phone amd eoi pens. I use it to go t the laundry mat and run errands. The embroidery is beauitful!

customer_reviews.title: Way small!
customer_reviews.text: This is a small backpack! I wouldn’t even call it a backpack

customer_reviews.text: My 21 year old daughter loves this bag! Colors are vibrant and embroidery is impeccable! Perfect size!

customer_reviews.title: Small Beauty
customer_reviews.text: It is a nicely made purse, fits a lot more than I thought. Nice color and patterns.

customer_reviews.title: Great little purse
customer_reviews.text: For the price awesome purse. It is made extremely well. Love the functionality of it. Use it daily. Can fit my iPhone in it too.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and beautiful. I absolutely love love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pouch purse. Very well made and beautiful. I absolutely love love it. Wanted to order s few more for gifts and they were out of stock! Hopefully they’ll get more.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great little purse when you don't want to carry the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little purse when you don't want to carry the big one. I get so many compliments. It is adorable for the price.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered several as gifts for friends, and they just loved them. Especially one who travel don't like to take large purses

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! I can carry my phone and a few other things when traveling or going shopping without lugging my normal giant purse around.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bag. It is beautiful and a perfect fit for phone, keys, cards, cash. With the strap doubled it fits safely and comfortably under my arm.

customer_reviews.title: Mt new travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag and got lots of compliments while I was on vacation.

customer_reviews.title: Cute

product_meta.title: Goodhan Vintage Handmade Women Mini Crossbody Bag Cellphone Pouch Small Handbag Coin Purse
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
